products.name: Cappuccino
products.description:
A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that
is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam.

products.name: Latte
products.description:
Caffè latte, often shortened to just latte in English,
is a coffee drink of Italian origin made with
espresso and steamed milk.

products.name: Caffè mocha
products.description:
A caffè mocha, also called mocaccino, is a
chocolate-flavoured warm beverage that
is a variant of a caffè latte.

products.name: Americano
products.description:
Caffè americano, also known as
Americano or American, is a type of coffee
drink prepared by diluting an espresso shot
with hot water at a 1:3 to 1:4 ratio.

products.name: Taro
products.description:
Taro milk tea has a sweet, nutty
flavour with a subtle but creamy vanilla finish.

products.name: Matcha
products.description:
Matcha is made using a shade-grown green tea powder.
The green tea gives this milky frothy
drink a sweet, moorish vegetal taste
